description: This file contains client-side JavaScript code for UI interactions, including popover behavior, quote display and animation, and tab switching logic for a web application.

classes.name: AppTabs
classes.description: Class managing tab switching and animation in the UI.

methods.name: AppTabs.prototype.onSelect
methods.description: Handles tab selection event, showing the selected tab content.

methods.name: AppTabs.prototype.switchTab
methods.description: Handles the visual transition when switching tabs.
